survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Online Tutoring Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of subscription-based online tutoring services to evaluate satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based online tutoring services?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents based on their experience level. Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based online tutoring services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable in your online tutoring service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: This multi-choice question helps identify key features that appeal to users. Ensure the interface allows selecting up to 3 options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most valuable in your online tutoring service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of tutoring provided by your service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this satisfaction question. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of tutoring provided by your service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your online tutoring experience?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows respondents to provide detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for thorough responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your online tutoring experience?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your online tutoring service to others?
questions.client_notes: This Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question helps measure loyalty. Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your online tutoring service to others?
